colorScheme.title: The Color Scheme
colorScheme.description: Color scheme can be light or dark

backgroundColor.title: Background Color
backgroundColor.description: Any color other than standard bootstrap classes like primary, secondary, dark, etc. Could be any of standard color names: https://www.w3schools.com/colors/colors_hex.asp. Or these could be any hex values like #00bfff. If backgroundColor is specified, backgroundColorClass gets ignored
